Variable table_init_param¶

  • Defined in File constants.h

Variable Documentation¶

std::unordered_map<std::string, Init_cons_idx> const table_init_param = {{"pressure_init", Init_cons_idx::pressure}, {"T_init", Init_cons_idx::T}, {"w_init", Init_cons_idx::w}, {"S_init", Init_cons_idx::S}, {"QC_init", Init_cons_idx::qc}, {"QR_init", Init_cons_idx::qr}, {"QV_init", Init_cons_idx::qv}, {"NCCLOUD_init", Init_cons_idx::Nc}, {"NCRAIN_init", Init_cons_idx::Nr}, {"QI_init", Init_cons_idx::qi}, {"NCICE_init", Init_cons_idx::Ni}, {"QS_init", Init_cons_idx::qs}, {"NCSNOW_init", Init_cons_idx::Ns}, {"QG_init", Init_cons_idx::qg}, {"NCGRAUPEL_init", Init_cons_idx::Ng}, {"QH_init", Init_cons_idx::qh}, {"NCHAIL_init", Init_cons_idx::Nh}, {"z_init", Init_cons_idx::z}}¶

Mapping of json configuration names to parameters in a model_constants_t. Only for initial conditions.
